headline: 3 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: An important key to Buffett's strategy is to keep it simple and invest in sure things.  There's no need to go on about the success that Berkshire Hathway has seen under the stewardship of Warren Buffett and his team.  Greg Abel, his successor, and the rest of the Berkshire team have learned from the best of the best, and I think their picks hold sway.

headline: 3 Reasons to Buy FAS and 3 Reasons Not to
summary: It's a high-risk, high-potential-reward exchange-traded fund for bold investors.
